amendment.description: To make technical changes to Sec. 111 relative to impact assistance payments to States and political subdivisions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1401 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1401 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S9942-9943; text: CR S9943) To make technical changes to Sec. 111 relative to impact assistance payments to States and political subdivisions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1401 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1401 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Landrieu.
